items.sentence: It's been three years since Tom's accident, and he still walks with a limp.
Maybe it's time for you to decide what you're going to do after Tom leaves.
It was particularly bad this week. The train was late for two days running.
Tom was raised by his older sister after their parents died in an accident.
Maybe one of my grandchildren will be the first person to set foot on Mars.
Tom can remember the chords to the song, but can\'t remember all the lyrics.
Tom couldn\'t keep lying to Mary. He felt he just had to tell her the truth.
From the time he was a small boy, Tom knew that he wanted to be a policeman.
Tom was the one who gave me the painting that\'s hanging above my fireplace.
Who wouldn\'t love to find one of these under the tree on Christmas morning?
